scripts.dev: concurrently -n FE,DB,BE "pnpm --filter frontend dev" "pnpm --filter @rally/db dev" "pnpm --filter backend dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter @rally/db build && pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.clean: pnpm --recursive exec rm -rf node_modules dist .next tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rm -rf node_modules
